intro: Gymnorebutia buiningiana, commonly known as the Buning's gymnorebutia, is a species of flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. This succulent plant is characterized by its fleshy, ribbed stems and small, star-shaped flowers that bloom in shades of yellow and white. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often found in rocky soils. Due to its unique appearance and limited distribution, it is considered a rare and specialized plant.
